## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for and removed console.logs (or justified their presence)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this in a fresh clone/environment

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have updated the README.md if needed
- [ ] I have updated .env.example if I added new environment variables
- [ ] I have added comments to my code where necessary

### Breaking Changes
- [ ] This PR introduces breaking changes (if yes, describe below)
- [ ] I have updated the migration guide (if applicable)
